00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * This file contains defines for the ILK interface

00045  * <hr>$Revision: 49448 $<hr>

00047  *
00048  */
00049 #ifndef __CVMX_ILK_H__
00050 #define __CVMX_ILK_H__
00051 
00052 #ifdef CVMX_BUILD_FOR_LINUX_KERNEL
00053 #include <asm/octeon/cvmx.h>
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00057 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00058 extern "C" {
00059 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 /* CSR typedefs have been moved to cvmx-ilk-defs.h */
00063 
00064 /*
00065  * Note: this macro must match the first ilk port in the ipd_port_map_68xx[]
00066  * and ipd_port_map_78xx[] arrays.
00067  */
00068 static inline int CVMX_ILK_GBL_BASE(void) {
00069     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN68XX))
00070         return 5;
00071     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX))
00072         return 6;
00073     return -1;
00074 }
00075 static inline int CVMX_ILK_QLM_BASE(void) {
00076     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN68XX))
00077         return 1;
00078     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX))
00079         return 4;
00080     return -1;
00081 }
00082 
00083 typedef struct {
00084     int intf_en:1;
00085     int la_mode:1;
00086     int reserved:14;        /* unused */
00087     int lane_speed:16;
00088     /* add more here */
00089 } cvmx_ilk_intf_t;
00090 
00091 #define CVMX_NUM_ILK_INTF  2
00092 static inline int CVMX_ILK_MAX_LANES(void) {
00093     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN68XX))
00094         return 8;
00095     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX))
00096         return 16;
00097     return -1;
00098 }
00099 extern CVMX_SHARED unsigned short cvmx_ilk_lane_mask[CVMX_MAX_NODES][CVMX_NUM_ILK_INTF];
00100 
00101 typedef struct {
00102     unsigned int pipe;
00103     unsigned int chan;
00104 } cvmx_ilk_pipe_chan_t;
00105 
00106 #define CVMX_ILK_MAX_PIPES 45
00107 /* Max number of channels allowed */
00108 #define CVMX_ILK_MAX_CHANS 256
00109 
00110 extern CVMX_SHARED int cvmx_ilk_chans[CVMX_MAX_NODES][CVMX_NUM_ILK_INTF];
00111 
00112 typedef struct {
00113     unsigned int chan;
00114     unsigned int pknd;
00115 } cvmx_ilk_chan_pknd_t;
00116 
00117 #define CVMX_ILK_MAX_PKNDS 16   /* must be <45 */
00118 
00119 typedef struct {
00120     int *chan_list; /* for discrete channels. or, must be null */
00121     unsigned int num_chans;
00122 
00123     unsigned int chan_start;    /* for continuous channels */
00124     unsigned int chan_end;
00125     unsigned int chan_step;
00126 
00127     unsigned int clr_on_rd;
00128 } cvmx_ilk_stats_ctrl_t;
00129 
00130 #define CVMX_ILK_MAX_CAL      288
00131 #define CVMX_ILK_MAX_CAL_IDX  (CVMX_ILK_MAX_CAL / 8)
00132 #define CVMX_ILK_TX_MIN_CAL   1
00133 #define CVMX_ILK_RX_MIN_CAL   1
00134 #define CVMX_ILK_CAL_GRP_SZ   8
00135 #define CVMX_ILK_PIPE_BPID_SZ 7
00136 #define CVMX_ILK_ENT_CTRL_SZ  2
00137 #define CVMX_ILK_RX_FIFO_WM   0x200
00138 
00139 typedef enum {
00140     PIPE_BPID = 0,
00141     LINK,
00142     XOFF,
00143     XON
00144 } cvmx_ilk_cal_ent_ctrl_t;
00145 
00146 typedef struct {
00147     unsigned char pipe_bpid;
00148     cvmx_ilk_cal_ent_ctrl_t ent_ctrl;
00149 } cvmx_ilk_cal_entry_t;
00150 
00151 typedef enum {
00152     CVMX_ILK_LPBK_DISA = 0,
00153     CVMX_ILK_LPBK_ENA
00154 } cvmx_ilk_lpbk_ena_t;
00155 
00156 typedef enum {
00157     CVMX_ILK_LPBK_INT = 0,
00158     CVMX_ILK_LPBK_EXT
00159 } cvmx_ilk_lpbk_mode_t;
00160 
00161 /**
00162  * This header is placed in front of all received ILK look-aside mode packets
00163  */
00164 typedef union {
00165     uint64_t u64;
00166 
00167     struct {
00168 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00169         uint32_t reserved_63_57:7;  /* bits 63...57 */
00170         uint32_t nsp_cmd:5;     /* bits 56...52 */
00171         uint32_t nsp_flags:4;       /* bits 51...48 */
00172         uint32_t nsp_grp_id_upper:6;    /* bits 47...42 */
00173         uint32_t reserved_41_40:2;  /* bits 41...40 */
00174         /* Protocol type, 1 for LA mode packet */
00175         uint32_t la_mode:1;     /* bit  39      */
00176         uint32_t nsp_grp_id_lower:2;    /* bits 38...37 */
00177         uint32_t nsp_xid_upper:4;   /* bits 36...33 */
00178         /* ILK channel number, 0 or 1 */
00179         uint32_t ilk_channel:1;     /* bit  32      */
00180         uint32_t nsp_xid_lower:8;   /* bits 31...24 */
00181         /* Unpredictable, may be any value */
00182         uint32_t reserved_23_0:24;  /* bits 23...0  */
00183 #else
00184         uint32_t reserved_23_0:24;  /* bits 23...0  */
00185         uint32_t nsp_xid_lower:8;   /* bits 31...24 */
00186         uint32_t ilk_channel:1;     /* bit  32      */
00187         uint32_t nsp_xid_upper:4;   /* bits 36...33 */
00188         uint32_t nsp_grp_id_lower:2;    /* bits 38...37 */
00189         uint32_t la_mode:1;     /* bit  39      */
00190         uint32_t reserved_41_40:2;  /* bits 41...40 */
00191         uint32_t nsp_grp_id_upper:6;    /* bits 47...42 */
00192         uint32_t nsp_flags:4;       /* bits 51...48 */
00193         uint32_t nsp_cmd:5;     /* bits 56...52 */
00194         uint32_t reserved_63_57:7;  /* bits 63...57 */
00195 #endif
00196     } s;
00197 } cvmx_ilk_la_nsp_compact_hdr_t;
00198 
00199 typedef struct cvmx_ilk_LA_mode_struct
00200 {
00201     int ilk_LA_mode;
00202     int ilk_LA_mode_cal_ena;
00203 } cvmx_ilk_LA_mode_t;
00204 
00205 extern CVMX_SHARED cvmx_ilk_LA_mode_t cvmx_ilk_LA_mode[CVMX_NUM_ILK_INTF];
00206 extern int cvmx_ilk_use_la_mode(int interface, int channel);
00207 
00208 extern int cvmx_ilk_start_interface(int interface, unsigned short num_lanes);
00209 extern int cvmx_ilk_start_interface_la(int interface, unsigned char num_lanes);
00210 extern int cvmx_ilk_set_pipe(int interface, int pipe_base, unsigned int pipe_len);
00211 extern int cvmx_ilk_tx_set_channel(int interface, cvmx_ilk_pipe_chan_t * pch, unsigned int num_chs);
00212 extern int cvmx_ilk_rx_set_pknd(int interface, cvmx_ilk_chan_pknd_t * chpknd, unsigned int num_pknd);
00213 extern int cvmx_ilk_enable(int interface);
00214 extern int cvmx_ilk_disable(int interface);
00215 extern int cvmx_ilk_get_intf_ena(int interface);
00216 extern int cvmx_ilk_get_chan_info(int interface, unsigned char **chans, unsigned char *num_chan);
00217 extern cvmx_ilk_la_nsp_compact_hdr_t cvmx_ilk_enable_la_header(int ipd_port, int mode);
00218 extern void cvmx_ilk_show_stats(int interface, cvmx_ilk_stats_ctrl_t * pstats);
00219 extern int cvmx_ilk_cal_setup_rx(int interface, int cal_depth, cvmx_ilk_cal_entry_t * pent, int hi_wm, unsigned char cal_ena);
00220 extern int cvmx_ilk_cal_setup_tx(int interface, int cal_depth, cvmx_ilk_cal_entry_t * pent, unsigned char cal_ena);
00221 extern int cvmx_ilk_lpbk(int interface, cvmx_ilk_lpbk_ena_t enable, cvmx_ilk_lpbk_mode_t mode);
00222 extern int cvmx_ilk_la_mode_enable_rx_calendar(int interface);
00223 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00224 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00225 }
00226 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00227 #endif
